The timing of the photograph: The expert's verdict states that the photograph was taken on 21 December 2017, which contradicts the claim that it shows Andrew McCabe being escorted out of the FBI building in January 2018. This aspect verifies the inaccuracy of the claim.
Source of the photograph: The expert mentions that the photograph was taken by Getty Images photographer Chip Somodevilla. This aspect provides evidence of the authenticity of the photograph itself.
Location of the photograph: The expert's verdict states that the photograph was taken in the Rayburn House Office Building, not at the FBI building. This aspect confirms that the photograph is unrelated to McCabe's departure from the FBI.
Testimony purpose: The expert mentions that McCabe was on his way to a meeting with various government committees to provide testimony on different topics. This aspect further supports the fact that the photograph captures McCabe's involvement in a different event, rather than his departure from the FBI.
